column5: Buddys fish in the 2nd last pic is a tank bud. Nice, real nice.  I had some chase from 80 up to 30 and turn. Stupid fish.LOL  I,ll get them eventually.  Thanks for the post.
Wow, those are some beasts there, well done
Simcoe?(or a secret?)  BEAUTY lakers!  Doug
That's a couple good outings there , well done !!!
Awesome pix - thanx!  Those things are huge!
Wow , those are superb looking lakers !!!!
My eyes are greasy with envy.  Well done Steve!
Im 0 for 2 out there this season..... just don't know what I'm doing wrong.  Ah well....figuring it out is half the fun.  Now....you said crankbaits.  Care to explain?
Just realized you likely meant lipless rattling cranks....duh...

Yeah im sure thats what he meant  I did see somewhere that you can now get weighted clips to vertically fish crank baits through the ice. That would be pretty cool if it worked good.  Maybe in an In Fisherman or something?

Yeah im sure thats what he meant  I did see somewhere that you can now get weighted clips to vertically fish crank baits through the ice. That would be pretty cool if it worked good.  Maybe in an In Fisherman or something? Not exactly what you were talking about, but just found these after readin a KVD article, I thought it was a pretty cool idea.  He also talked about clip-on weights that attach to the split ring. http://www.basspro.com/STORM-Suspendots-and-SuspenStrips-Weights/product/202/

Anyone have any idea what lake this is at all? Seems like a big one, so it cant be "too secret"  for a second i thought parry sound but then quickly realized you cant keep any fish until february, and even then its only 1.
Nice Bill. Not like we don't have enough towns and villages out there already.          :tease:
Nice Bill. Not like we don't have enough towns and villages out there already.          :tease:  Let's rename the lake, maybe the guys from the city won't figure it out

lol im gonna walk out on simcoe blindly,  with no clue what i am doing what so ever...im sure it will work out perfectly for me.  I am just waiting for Bill to treck across parry sound harbour to give me the all clear  Killer job though guys
Simcoe isn't very hard to figure out especially if you're fishing Kemp.  Find an access point, pop a few holes, look for some fish and there ya go.
